name: GoaLounge
description:
Goalounge brings to you a unique football gaming experience made for passionate football fans.

Whether you want to prove you have the footballing knowledge, or to simply just chisel your football trivia to the next level, we present the perfect football trivia game.

Goalounge combines a refreshing challenge with your passion like no other.

How to play?

The game is made up of 3 stages, there is a minimum points requirement that must be achieved to be able to progress to the next stage.

Each stage brings a new gaming experience, which will put your football expertise to the ultimate test.

Stage 1- I played with

During the game four players will appear on the screen, with a fifth one located just below them.

The fifth player, located below, will be the one in question.

Gamers must use their footballing expertise to identify whether the fifth player has, at some point in his career, either at club or international level, played with the four players above.

Gamers must swipe the fifth player right, if they believe he has played with the other four players on-screen, or, swipe left, if they believe the player has not played with the other four players on screen.

You will collect 10 points for every correct swipe. To progress to stage 2, you must achieve 200 or more points from a possible 270.

Stage 2- True or False

A player and Club logo will appear on your screen. You must click either True or False to whether you believe the player has played at the club.

You will collect 10 points for every correct answer. To progress to stage 3, you must achieve 140 or more points from a possible 180. This means that you can't afford to get more than 4 questions wrong out of 18.
The pressure is on!

Stage 3- Match the club

4 club logos will appear on screen with a player just above them. You must click to highlight the clubs that you think the player has played for.

You will collect 20 points for every correct answer. To complete the final stage, you must accumulate a total of 240 or more points from a possible 360.

There are hint options available at each stage exclusively for Premium users.


For just $2.99 you can subscribe to become a premium user.

What are the benefits?

By going premium you will have access to;

*Unlimited game play: After passing all stages you can start a new pack of fresh questions without having to wait 6 hours. Which means more game play, more points, more coins, and unlimited fun at your disposal!
*Hints: A series of different hint options to help you answer correctly and avoid missing out on progressing to the next stage.

With Goalounge you don't need to be a football pundit to enjoy the game since the game caters for people with varying levels of football knowledge. Remember, every challenge makes you better and increases your overall football IQ.

Be a winner with Goalounge!

NOTE: Goalounge subscriptions are auto-renewable. You will be charged for your subscription through your account unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
